conclusion: Analyze the motion of the charged particle using mechanics and electromagnetism principles.
Identify the given parameters: uniform magnetic field perpendicular to the paper, uniform electric field between plates MN and PQ, length and distance of plates are L, particle injected from point S.
Determine initial conditions: particle at point S with velocity v_0, magnetic field strength B, electric field strength E.
Apply Lorentz force: net force must be zero for particle to remain in magnetic field, F_L = qv_B x B.
Determine final conditions: particle just fails to exit magnetic field from side cd, magnetic force must equal electric force.
Set up equation for particle's motion: F_B = F_E, qv_B x B = qE x L.
Solve for velocity v: v_B = E/B x L.
Calculate velocity of particle: total distance traveled is 2L, velocity v = E/B x 2L.
Substitute given values: E = 10 V, B = 0.5 T, 2L = 4 L.
Final velocity of particle when shot into point S is 40 m/s.
